body_html: It's also annoying if there are some buffers you don't want to save/reload. Being able to ignore them explicitly or being able to load an incomplete state dictionnary would be much less verbose.
body_text: It's also annoying if there are some buffers you don't want to save/reload. Being able to ignore them explicitly or being able to load an incomplete state dictionnary would be much less verbose.
body: It's also annoying if there are some buffers you don't want to save/reload. Being able to ignore them explicitly or being able to load an incomplete state dictionnary would be much less verbose.
